text: Allahale nai timro lagi aphule srsti gareka kuraharubata chayam banayo ra usaile pahadaharuma timro lagi guphaharu banayo ra vastraharu (pani) jasale timila'i garamibata baca'umchan ra (yasta) vastraharu (pani) jasale timila'i yud'dhako bela kama lagchan, ra raksa gardachan. Yastai prakarale allaha aphno krpa timimathi pura gardacha ki timi ajnakari banna saka
